question: You have received a letter from your neighbour complaining about noise from your house/flat.Write a letter to your neighbour. In your letterexplain the cause of the noiseapologise for the noisedescribe what action you will take to solve the problemWrite at least 150 words.You do NOT need to write any addresses.Begin your letter as follows:Dear ……………….You should spend about 20 minutes on this task.
text: I hope you and your family are in good spirits. I received your letter yesterday and I offer my deepest apology for causing any disturbance because of loud music.

Firstly, I incorporate music into my workout sessions each and every day, without fail. That being said, I was not aware of the fact that you were being bogged down by it, honestly speaking. Secondly, there are no such restrictions on playing loud music in our society, The Santushti Apartments. So, I didn't think of taking any approvals beforehand.

Considering all the above, I would like to apologize for my innocent mistake and I will certainly make sure that I am under the limit when it comes to playing music. Also, I am willing to use my headphones if I start my fitness session in the evening, ensuring that neighbours are left undisturbed, especially the children who study at such hours.
Anyway, It has been a while since I last saw you personally. Let us meet on the weekends over a few drinks.
I look forward to meeting you soon.
